comment.body:
> Hi. Cannot reproduce. What causes an issue - one of enabled filters?

Hi, sorry for the late reply but I didn't know there was a reply. But thanks to your question, I have figured out that it was the Adguard French filter that is causing this issue. Disabling just that filter and the bug doesn't occur anymore.
Thanks

HI Jelli
 
Please find bellow.  I did a reset of adguard to defaults which has removed the ad’s.
 
I have done this twice . ads are not showing at this time
 
Thank you
 

 
From: jellizaveta ***@***.***> 
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2023 1:48 AM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: wrh01 ***@***.***>; Mention ***@***.***>

issue.title: Issues with MX Player app

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Not Applicable

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mxtech.videoplayer.ad

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. This breaks the user experience for MX Player's OTT users as qqcdnpictest.mxplay.com is mainly used to deliver image assets (i.e. content preview and thumbnails). 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/1e0e9efa1474af5d20f04e5fe30aad2101733b6d/MobileFilter/sections/adservers.txt#L138

2. Screenshots
![Screenshot 2023-03-23 at 21 41 08](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/80810457/227441437-7492bf0a-fa54-44e8-a3ba-fc3cc7c0897c.jpeg)

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I don't have this UI on my end. Does unblocking the request solve this problem?
@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers please take a look at this.

labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://amedia.online/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Famedia.online%2F) ### Comment > Пытался сделать вручную фильтр, не получается. Реклама выскакивает даже после настройки фильтра. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/XMT8Uvc.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/kimfaI6.png)

issue.title: Issues with MX Player app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Not Applicable

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mxtech.videoplayer.ad

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. This breaks the user experience for MX Player's OTT users as qqcdnpictest.mxplay.com is mainly used to deliver image assets (i.e. content preview and thumbnails). 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/1e0e9efa1474af5d20f04e5fe30aad2101733b6d/MobileFilter/sections/adservers.txt#L138

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![Screenshot 2023-03-23 at 21 41 08](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/80810457/227440644-42d27fe7-6a86-4973-8703-4f7c560c1746.jpeg)
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, turn ABPVN List on, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

This domain is also used to serve image assets for MX Player's OTT platform (i.e., Online Streaming Service). It's broken now.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/80810457/227437918-e50450e6-6b9a-48ee-8224-de55a47f0028.png)
